title: Practice Tool not showing up.
body: I updated my League Of Legends client for the new one because the Practice Tool was live now, but it doesn't appear for me |:

replies.body:
The Practice tool isn't actually live for NA just yet. We're slowly rolling it out, to make sure nothing breaks in the process. Your patience is appreciated! :)

If you have any other questions, don't hesitate to let me know.
Is there an exact time as to when it comes out for NA?
hi do you know when the Practice tool will come out in na ?
Thanks for replying Targons, you're awesome, i'll wait for the practice tool it's worth it.  {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

yeah me too , i updated the client because they promised practise tool , and it didn't show up , so i just returned to the old client because the new one is so laggy and i couldn't even  ban on queue or lock in because the animations take forever and you only have like 20 secs by the time everything clears up and i can ban i have like a sec left i got banned twice so i just went back to the one that is WAY better client
You can turn animations off in the settings as well as turn on a low perfomamce mode for less powerful computers.
